name: Remembrance Dale
description:
A modest exploration of input scripting and level design playable with either controller or keyboard and mouse. The primary mode of interaction is a projectile system based on a slingshot, which the player must use to navigate a handful of puzzles.

Controls:

Escape*: Exit Game                                                                                                                                      R*: Reset Level

W,A,S,D: Movement                                                                                                                                  Mouse Position: Aiming                                                                                                                        Left Mouse Button: Fire

*These controls cannot be changed and function even when using the Controller
